linkSkill.name: Rigid Body
linkSkill.shortDesc: Reduces damage taken by 4%, including attacks at a certain ratio of maximum HP

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/nature-master.png} tip={Nature Master}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/best-friend.png} tip={Best Friend}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/in-depth-geomancy.png} tip={In-depth Geomancy}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/insight.png} tip={Insight}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/advanced-wand-mastery.png} tip={Advanced Wand Mastery}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/relaxation.png} tip={Relaxation}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/anima-warrior.png} tip={Anima Warrior}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/absorption-sunlit-grain.png} tip={Absorption: Sunlit Grain}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/absorption-fierce-wind.png} tip={Absorption: Fierce Wind}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/absorption-river-puddle-douse.png} tip={Absorption: River Puddle Douse}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/anima-heros-will.png} tip={Anima Hero's Will}> -> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/lara/mountain-embrace.png} tip={Mountain Embrace}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/soul-strike-reinforce.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike – Reinforce}> Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike – Reinforce_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/relentless-slash-reinforce.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash – Reinforce}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/relentless-slash-boss-slayer.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash – Boss Killer}> Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash - Reinforce and Boss Rush_<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/lost-soul-advent-reinforce.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent – Reinforce}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/lost-soul-advent-guardbreak.png} tip={Lost Soul Advent – Ignore Guard}> Lost Soul Advent - Reinforce and Guardbreak_>

nodes: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/final-attack.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/petal-attack.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/relentless-slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash (4th Job)}>

<tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/season-attack-1.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground / Void Fang / Infinite Blades (3rd Job / 4th Job / Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/actual-final-attack.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash / Plum Blossom Sword 4th Form: Zero Blade (4th Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/aw-slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Slash (1st Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/aw-stab.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Stab (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/final-attack.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/aw-gash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Pierce (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/petal-attack.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/season-attack-1.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground / Void Fang / Infinite Blades (3rd Job / 4th Job / Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/relentless-slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (4th Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/actual-final-attack.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash / Plum Blossom Sword 4th Form: Zero Blade (4th Job)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Len Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build

primary.name: Return
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 5 MP. Teleport to the Serpent’s Lake.\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: This skill is obtained from the Len storyline

primary.name: Shapeshift
primary.shortDesc: When used, hide your ears and equip your hair accessory. When used again, hide both your ears and hair accessory.\nCooldown: 2 seconds.
details: This skill is obtained from the Len storyline

primary.name: Exclusive Spell
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete Len's storyline

primary.name: Spirit Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Minion Duration +10%

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Slash
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 10 MP. Deals 210% damage 2 times on up to 5 enemies.

primary.name: Clear Breeze Step
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 5 MP. Jump a certain distance.
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Plum Blossom Secret
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 10 MP. Jump a certain distance.\nIf you hold the skill key down after using it, you can float for 1 second. If you float, there is a 5 second cooldown.\n[Passive Effect: 40% stance]
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key while in the air
After using, holding the Jump Key will allow you to slowly float down<bp_You can move while floating_>

primary.name: Clear Breeze Mindfulness
primary.shortDesc: 20 movement speed, 20 maximum movement speed, 20 jump.

primary.name: Clear and Pure Mind
primary.shortDesc: 30 attack, 15% critical rate, 5% final damage.\n20% damage reduction.

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Stab
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 20 MP. Deals 263% damage 3 times on up to 5 enemies.

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword 1st Form: Gentle Dash
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 20 MP. Draw your sword and teleport forwards. After drawing your sword, you can re-input the skill to sheathe it. If you sheathe the sword, you can teleport backwards.\n[Passive Effect: 10% max HP]
details: Pressing the Skill Key again will perform a dash again

primary.name: Longsword Booster
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 10 MP. For 200 seconds, increases the Longsword’s attack speed by 2 stages.

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike
primary.shortDesc: When Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental or Dance of Annihilation hits an enemy, there is a 35% chance to activate at the hit enemy’s location. If the hit enemy is already defeated, it will activate at the character’s location.\nDeals 300% damage 4 times on up to 8 enemies.
primary.desc: Successful attacks have a chance to deal a slashing attack

primary.name: Longsword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: 50% Longsword mastery, 30 attack.

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Increase Strength by 60

primary.name: Clear and Pure Mind II
primary.shortDesc: 20% critical rate, 10% final damage.

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Pierce
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 30 MP. Deals 408% damage 4 times on up to 6 enemies.

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums
primary.shortDesc: When your directly attacking skills hit an enemy, there is a 35% activation chance.\nCreate 5 plum blossom petals that deal 120% damage 3 times. When attacking normal monsters, damage is increased by 120%p.

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike II
primary.shortDesc: When Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental or Dance of Annihilation hits an enemy, there is a 35% chance to activate at the hit enemy’s location. If the hit enemy is already defeated, it will activate at the character’s location.\nDeals 450% damage 4 times on up to 8 enemies.

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword 1st Form: Vital Energy
primary.shortDesc: When your attack hits an enemy, there is a 35% activation chance to recover 2.2% max HP and activate the buff.\nThe buff has a 4 second duration. During the buff, increases status resistance by 100.\nReactivation cooldown: 6 seconds.

primary.name: Lost Soul Advent
primary.shortDesc: For each Ultimate, for 15 seconds you can input the skill key to use the Lost Soul Sword Ultimates you have learned.\nThe Ultimates will be used in the order of Splitting Ground, Void Fang, Infinite Blades, and Soul Blade.\nReactivation cooldown: 20 seconds.

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 40 MP.\nSlash forwards, dealing 550% damage 5 times on up to 10 enemies. Afterwards, a sword slash splits the ground, dealing 689% damage 7 times on up to 10 enemies.

primary.name: Clear and Pure Mind III
primary.shortDesc: 20% max HP, 10% critical rate, 10% final damage.

primary.name: Strong Body
primary.shortDesc: 200 defense, 30 status resistance, 60% stance.\n20% damage reduction, 30% elemental resistance.

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 9 MP. Continuously deals 168% damage 5 times on up to 8 enemies.

primary.name: 오도
primary.shortDesc:
MP 120 consumption
Input the direction key to convert some of the herbors of the plum sword into a German martial arts.
3 seconds meal : 3 seconds meals: conversion to a striking teeth
1 second cooldown

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade
primary.shortDesc:
Consumes 80 MP. Continuously deals 590% damage 4 times on up to 6 enemies.
Only 1 sword slash can exist on the map. It can be created up to 28 times, including the first cast. A single enemy can only be hit up to 3 times.
You will prepare 1 sword slash every 10 seconds, and you can hold up to 2.
If you switch between Keen Blade and Single Strike Keen Blade, you cannot use the skill during Single Strike Keen Blade’s cooldown, and all of Keen Blade’s prepared sword slashes will be reset.
--------Single Strike Keen Blade--------
Consumes 80 MP. Continuously deals 210% damage 7 times on up to 6 enemies. A single enemy can only be hit up to 20 times.
Cooldown: 30 seconds.

primary.name: Plum Blossom Sword 4th Form: Zero Blade
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 100 MP. For 3 seconds, you are invincible.\nDeals 395% damage 6 times on up to 8 enemies.\nCooldown: 70 seconds.

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike III
primary.shortDesc: When Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental or Dance of Annihilation hits an enemy, there is a 35% chance to activate at the hit enemy’s location. If the hit enemy is already defeated, it will activate at the character’s location.\nDeals 743% damage 4 times on up to 8 enemies.

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash
primary.shortDesc: [Final Attack Type Skill] 60% chance to deal 209% damage 2 times.

primary.name: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 40 MP. Deals 1251% damage 9 times on up to 10 enemies.

primary.name: Anima Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Grandis Goddess appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Anima Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/explorers/paladin/combat-orders.png} tip={Temporarily increases all of your skill levels. Only 4th Job Skills can be increased beyond master level while other skills can only be increased to master level. Exceptions: Some special skills, beginner skills, Combat Orders, hyper skills, 5th job skills, and 6th job skills cannot be increased.}/> Combat Orders

primary.name: Advanced Longsword Mastery
primary.shortDesc: 70% Longsword mastery, 30 attack, 6% final damage.

primary.name: Clear and Pure Mind IV
primary.shortDesc: 57 attack, 20% final damage.

primary.name: True Eye
primary.shortDesc: 10% damage, 10% critical damage, 40% defense ignore.

hyperPassive.name: Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike – Reinforce
Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike – Guardbreak
Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike – Extra Target
Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash – Reinforce
Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash – Ignore Guard
Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash – Boss Killer

hyperActive.name: Plum Blossom Sword 5th Form: Thousand Binding Plum Branches
hyperActive.shortDesc: Consumes 150 MP. Deals 720% damage 12 times on up to 15 enemies.\nEnemies hit are bound for 10 seconds. The bind duration is increased by up to 100% based on the damage that Thousand Binding Plum Branches deals.\nCooldown: 120 seconds.

hyperActive.name: Elevation
hyperActive.shortDesc:
30 second duration.
When used, Lost Soul Advent’s cooldown and the Lost Soul Sword Ultimate stage progress are instantly reset.
During the buff, Lost Soul Advent can be used 3 times during Lost Soul Advent’s cooldown.
Cooldown: 120 seconds.

hyperActive.name: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades
hyperActive.shortDesc: Consumes 60 MP.\nActivate 8 strikes that deal 380% damage 7 times on up to 12 enemies.\nEnemies hit are engulfed in flames ignited by the inner energy, dealing 250% damage 3 times continuously for 5 seconds.

fifthMain.name: Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Plum Tree Aroma
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Consumes 1000 MP. 20 second duration.
During the buff, when your directly attacking skills hit an enemy, activate Plum Slash.
Plum Slash: Deals 280% damage 3 times on up to 12 enemies. The Plum Blossom Tree will bloom based on the number of Plum Slash activations.
When Relentless Slash, Relentless Slash VI, Dance of Annihilation, Keen Blade, Keen Blade VI, Single Strike Keen Blade, or Single Strike Keen Blade are activated 3 times, it will be considered as 1 activation.
Bloom: When Plum Slash is activated 30, 70, and 125 times, the tree will bloom and create 20, 40, and 65 Plum Blossom Flowers respectively.
Plum Blossom Flower: Deals 500% damage 3 times
Cooldown: 120 seconds.

fifthMain.name: Lost Soul Awakening
fifthMain.shortDesc:
When your directly attacking skills hit an enemy, activate Heavenly Fang. When Heavenly Fang is activated 90 times, Heavenly Punishment will be activated.
When Relentless Slash, Relentless Slash VI, Dance of Annihilation, Keen Blade, Keen Blade VI, Single Strike Keen Blade, or Single Strike Keen Blade are activated 3 times, it will be considered as 1 activation.
Heavenly Fang: Deals 600% damage 2 times on up to 12 enemies
Heavenly Punishment: Activate 9 strikes that deal 1950% damage 12 times on up to 15 enemies
Cooldown: 120 seconds.

fifthMain.name: Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Dance of Annihilation
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Consumes 500 MP. 5 second keydown.
Continuously deals 1050% damage 6 times on up to 15 enemies.
During the keydown, you will take 50% decreased damage (including % HP attacks).
Cooldown: 120 seconds.

fifthMain.name: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Soul Blade
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Consumes 120 MP. Deals 1200% damage 10 times on up to 15 enemies.
Fire 12 sword slashes that deal 1500% damage 3 times.
Additional 20% defense ignored.
Cooldown: 1 second.

fifthBoost.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Slash Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Slash Final Damage: +420%

fifthBoost.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Stab Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Stab Final Damage: +300%

fifthBoost.name: Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike Final Damage: +120%

fifthBoost.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Pierce Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Pierce Final Damage: +180%

fifthBoost.name: Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums Final Damage: +180%

fifthBoost.name: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground, Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang, and Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades Final Damage: +120%

fifthBoost.name: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash Final Damage: +120%

fifthBoost.name: Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade Final Damage: +120%

fifthBoost.name: Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash Boost
fifthBoost.shortDesc: Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash and Plum Blossom Sword 4th Form: Zero Blade Final Damage: +120%

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/relentless-slash.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental: Relentless Slash
masteryCore.shortDesc: Consumes 11 MP. Continuously deals 289% damage 5 times on up to 8 enemies.

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/final-attack.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike (2nd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/actual-final-attack.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash / Plum Blossom Sword 4th Form: Zero Blade (4th Job) (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Sword Fundamental: Soul Strike
masteryCore.shortDesc: When Plum Blossom Sword Fundamental or Dance of Annihilation hits an enemy, there is a 35% chance to activate at the hit enemy’s location. If the hit enemy is already defeated, it will activate at the character’s location.\nDeals 1210% damage 4 times on up to 8 enemies.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Sword 2nd Form: Connected Slash
masteryCore.shortDesc: [Final Attack Type Skill] 62% chance to deal 325% damage 2 times.

masteryCore.name: 3rd Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/season-attack-1.png} tip={Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground / Void Fang / Infinite Blades (3rd Job / 4th Job / Hyper Skill)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Advent
masteryCore.shortDesc: When Lost Soul Sword Ultimate skills hit enemies 8 times, activate 2 sword slashes that deal 1380% damage 5 times on up to 8 enemies. Each sword slash can only hit a single enemy 1 time.\nAdditional 20% defense ignored.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Splitting Ground
masteryCore.shortDesc: Consumes 50 MP.\nSlash forwards, dealing 1150% damage 5 times on up to 10 enemies. Afterwards, a sword slash splits the ground, dealing 1350% damage 7 times on up to 10 enemies.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Void Fang
masteryCore.shortDesc: Consumes 50 MP. Deals 2250% damage 9 times on up to 10 enemies.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Infinite Blades
masteryCore.shortDesc: Consumes 70 MP.\nActivate 8 strikes that deal 610% damage 7 times on up to 12 enemies.\nEnemies hit are engulfed in flames ignited by the inner energy, dealing 160% damage 3 times continuously for 5 seconds.

masteryCore.name: 4th Mastery Node
details: Requires <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/petal-attack.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums (3rd Job)}> <tt src={http://localhost:3000/grandislibrary/class-icons/anima/len/keen-blade-1.png} tip={Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade (4th Job)}> enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Plum Blossom Sword 2nd Form: Scattering Plums
masteryCore.shortDesc: When your directly attacking skills hit an enemy, there is a 35% activation chance.\nCreate 5 plum blossom petals that deal 180% damage 3 times. When attacking normal monsters, damage is increased by 270%p.

masteryCore.name: HEXA Plum Blossom Sword 3rd Form: Keen Blade
masteryCore.shortDesc:
Consumes 90 MP. Continuously deals 1020% damage 4 times on up to 6 enemies.
Only 1 sword slash can exist on the map. It can be created up to 28 times, including the first cast. A single enemy can only be hit up to 3 times.
You will prepare 1 sword slash every 10 seconds, and you can hold up to 2.If you switch between Keen Blade VI and Single Strike Keen Blade VI, you cannot use the skill during Single Strike Keen Blade VI’s cooldown, and all of Keen Blade VI’s prepared sword slashes will be reset.
--------HEXA Single Strike Keen Blade--------
Consumes 90 MP. Continuously deals 366% damage 7 times on up to 6 enemies. A single enemy can only be hit up to 20 times.
Cooldown: 30 seconds.

originSkill.name: Sky Splitting Azure Dragon Sword: Ascension
originSkill.shortDesc:
Consumes 1500 MP. You are invincible during the cast action.
Len and the Imugi’s energies ascend into the Azure Dragon’s energy, activating 58 shockwaves that deal 1500% damage 12 times.
The sword that contains the power of the Azure Dragon that split the world in a single blow activates 27 strikes that deal 2100% damage 15 times on up to 15 enemies.
Cooldown: 360 seconds.

boostCore.name: Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Plum Tree Aroma Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Plum Tree Aroma Final Damage: +60%

boostCore.name: Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Dance of Annihilation Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Plum Blossom Sword Ultimate: Dance of Annihilation Final Damage: +60%

boostCore.name: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Soul Blade Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Lost Soul Sword Ultimate: Soul Blade Final Damage: +60%

meta: Lara is an INT mage class part of the Anima class group. Lara uses Dragon Veins that periodically spawn in your surroundings that can be interacted with using your skills. Each Dragon Vein will have a special attribute of either River, Wind, or Sun with different effects when activated
